participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and focused, Michael is dedicated to his career and enjoys finding time for leisure activities.
participant_1.background: i'm now looking for a new job. my favorite movie is friday. i am a doctor. i enjoy going to the park.

participant_2.name: Sarah
